text: Ivar A. Mjør (18 September 1933 - 6 January 2017) was a Norwegian odontologist. Mjør was born in Norderhov. He was professor in dentistry at the University of Oslo, director of Nordisk Institutt for odontologisk materialprøving, president of the International Association for Dental Research, and professor at the University of Florida College of Dentistry. He published more than 300 scientific articles during his career. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2017 deaths Category:People from Ringerike (municipality) Category:Norwegian dentists Category:University of Oslo faculty
title: Ivar A. Mjør
